entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High plus 2 except 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow mixed with rain beginning this morning then changing to rain near noon. Local rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2 except 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 13 April 2023
